title: A Fattoush for Every Season | Reem Assil
description:
Referenced in this episode 

  • Arabiyya: Recipes from the Life of an Arab in Diaspora
  • Salatet Fattoush (California Fattoush Salad)

author: podcasts@food52.com (Kristen Miglore)

itunes:title: A Fattoush for Every Season | Reem Assil
itunes:author: Kristen Miglore
itunes:summary: With fireworks of juicy, crunchy, herby, tart, and sweet, Reem Assil's simple, California-style fattoush is the salad you'll want to eat all summer. And thanks to its simple pantry dressing, it can be the salad of fall, winter, and spring, too.
itunes:subtitle: With fireworks of juicy, crunchy, herby, tart, and sweet, Reem Assil's simple, California-style fattoush is the salad you'll want to eat all summer. And thanks to its simple pantry dressing, it can be the salad of fall, winter, and spring, too.
